channel.title: Reapage Drops
channel.description:
Hey guys I have no idea how u make npcdrops on reapage i am used to deltascape
This is what i put in npc drops [code]npcdrop = 48 1 13665 1 13655 1 13654 1[/code]
But when i kill the creature ( have about 10 times) I get no drops?
